get.summary: Get a (possibly filtered) list of graph domains
get.description:
This can be used to get the list of all graph domains or applying some filtering.
The parameters can be using wildcard (*) or doing exact matching.

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: The namespace of the graph domain

post.description: This creates a new graph domain.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The json representation of the graph domain

parameters.name: id-name
parameters.description: the name or the uuid of the vertex type

get.summary: Get a (possibly filtered) list of vertex types

The parameters can be using wildcard (*) or doing exact matching.

parameters.description: The json representation of the vertex type

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: the namespace of the vertex type

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: the name of the vertex type
